de:
The Nohara family and "Onsen G-Men", the secret government agency maintaining all the hot springs in Japan, fight against "Yuzame", a bath-hating terrorist organization plotting to wipe out all the hot springs in Japan.

(Source: Manabu Tsuribe)
nm: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 07: Explosion! The Hot Spring's Feel Good Final Battle
jp: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 07: Bakuhatsu! Onsen Wakuwaku Daikessen
